p: Bacterial strains were obtained from the culture collections of Plant Cytology and Biotechnology Laboratory of Tuscia University and the Institute of Pharmacy and Molecular Biotechnology at Heidelberg University. Five microbial cultures belonging to gram-positive (G +) and gram-negative (G −) bacteria were tested: E. coli American Type Culture Collection-ATCC 25,922 (G −), B. cereus ATCC 10,876 (G +), A. bohemicus DSM 102,855 (G −), K. marina DSM 16,420 (G +), and P. fluorescens ATCC 13,525 (G −).
